eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.collection

Class BreedingMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.collection.BreedingMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class BreedingMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. Sub menu of the collection menu, that is used to breed pets.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzPetEgg

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        int exp)
        Opens the menu for the given player. Shows an interface to breed pets and display breeding skill progression.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        exp - The breeding experience of the player.

      • destroyInventory

        public void destroyInventory(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent event)
        Cleans up everything, so the inventory can be closed. Pets in the breeding slots will be dropped.
        Specified by:
        destroyInventory in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
